name: Intergalactic Matchmaker
description:
Dear Matchmaker

Thank you for your interest in our show! We would love to have you on this week's episode to lend your years of matchmaking experience to our desperate singles from across the galaxy.

Click 'run game' to confirm your participation.

Sincerely

Head Producer, IM

Made for Nanoreno 2021

Play time 10-30 mins, no sound, works on computers/tablets, playable on mobile but some of the layouts are broken

There's a few intermittent bugs, but this was made for a 4 week game jam ;)

Warnings (highlight below)

Swearing, mentions of alcohol, some sexual references but it's all pretty tame
